content: {"locationId": "899", "organizationId": "777", "name": "Morrison Charitable Food Pantry NFP", "address1": "629 E Lincoln Way Rd", "address2": null, "city": "Morrison", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "61270", "country": null, "phone": "815-441-2733", "phoneExt": null, "website": "http://morrisonfoodpantry.org", "latitude": "41.8063", "longitude": "-89.95316", "foodPrograms": "", "serviceAreas": "ZIP CODE:  61270", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "We are located in the former Hilltop Bowling Lanes building located at 629 East Lincolnway Rd., Morrison, Il.. east of Kunes Auto Dealership.  We are open on Thursdays from 8:00 A.M. - 10:00A.M.  You will not need to leave your car. We come out to each car, obtain your information and then deliver food items to you.    We will be closed on November 27, 2025, December 25th, 2025 & January 01, 2026.  We will open reopen on the following Thursdays December 04, 2025, & January 08, 2026   Our clients may visit the pantry once in a calendar month and must be below the maximum income guidelines.  If there is an emergency situation, please talk to one of our staff and we will work with you.  If you are a first time visitor please have the following items available:      -an official ID available, i.e. Illinois Drivers License with current address     -current utility bill or a Landlords rental receipt with name and current address  Your current address, and our verification of it is a requirement we have to have on record for each client.  You will be asked to fill out a registration sheet, with your name, address, phone, and the name and ages of the persons living full time in your household at the time you sign up.  Should the number of people change, or you move, please let the staff know and we will update your information.  New FY24-25 income guidelines are in effect as of July 01, 2024, ( they have gone up ).  Go to morrisonfoodpantry@gmail.com for updates  We also ask that your vehicles be cleaned out so we have space to put your boxes in your vehicle without items getting smashed, or having to rearrange everything.  Your cooperation in keeping a clean space is greatly appreciated, and helps speed up the process.", "notes": "On January 01, all clients must re-register for the new calendar year, even if you just registered in December. Please bring a Official document, with your current address on it, such as your Drivers License (preferred), Utility Bill, Current Rental Receipt, or a recent piece of mail with your correct address listed,etc.  We serve the Morrison School District zip code 61270.  Our New location is 629 E. Lincolnway, Morrison, Il (the former Hilltop Bowling Alley East of Kunes Car Dealership)   We look forward to serving the Morrison Community in our new home.  You can email questions to morrisonfoodpantry@gmail.com.   Our Pantry will be closed on the following dates due to the Holidays:      November 27th, 2025 for Thanksgiving, we will reopen on December 04, 2025      December 25th, 2025 for Christmas, & January 01, 2026 for New Years  reopening on January 08, 2026", "contactName": "Leveda Ashlin", "contactPhone": "815-441-2733", "contactEmail": "Morrisonfoodpantry@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 14, "regionName": "River Bend Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "27f2b82c-b145-46d8-a570-4c990f38833b.png", "website": "http://riverbendfoodbank.org/"}, {"regionId": 25, "regionName": "Sauk Valley Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "fad509cb-5af1-4b94-a343-2d5fd3448d55.png", "website": "https://saukvalleyfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Thursday 8:00 AM-10:00 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
